relevant_findings.oral: Blood slowly oozing from the vicinity of the lower-right second molar, no visible mucosal laceration
relevant_findings.conjunctival: Mild pallor noted, no scleral icterus
relevant_findings.cardiac: Mild lateral apical displacement, regular heart rate and rhythm, no murmur, rub, or gallop
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, not tender, normal bowel sounds, no hepatosplenomegaly or masses
relevant_findings.rectal: No masses, scant amount of brown stool negative for occult blood
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, brisk capillary refill, no clubbing, cyanosis, or edema
relevant_findings.skin: No rashes, petechiae, ecchymoses, or telangiectasias
relevant_findings.neurological: Normal cranial nerves, muscle strength, sensation, deep-tendon reflexes, coordination, and gait
